version_description:
- 9 new tanks;
- New OilField map;
- New game mode: Capture The Flag;
- Rounds;
- Premium Accounts;
- Armor zones;
- Clans and clan chat;
- Silver coins;
- Ranks;
- Antiflood system and moderation;
- Bugfixes and optimizations;

- 2 new maps: Forest and City
- 14 new tanks
- Upgrades
- Camouflages
- Different armament
- Artillery
- Autocannons
- IR Smoke
- Updated tank control
- Updated environment graphics
- Updated tanks graphics
- Updated game balance
- Gamepads support
- Regional chats
- Bugfixes and optimizations

- 8 new tanks
- new winter map
- day time and night time battles
- night vision and thermal vision devices
- destructible environment
- rocket needs to lock target now
- Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Turkish and Vietnamese localizations
- bugfixes

Tankers! Download the latest update now and get back into the action!
• 5 new tanks: ARL 44, Type 82, Type 89, Supersherman, Jaguar
• 11 camouflages
• New map “Village”
• 11 new camouflage patterns
• New aviation: Su-7 and A4 Skyhawk
• New battle ranks
• Map revenue is now varied on the type of the map
• Optimized tank balance and smokescreen
• Optimized overall performance
• Bug fixes: radio, first aid kit.

- Private messages
- New game mode: Control Points
- Significant optimization of network stability and traffic saving
- New map: Alabino
...and much more

* 37 new tanks
* New User interface
* Updated Engine
* Reworked Physics
* Better Sounds
* New Shaders
* Improved Effects
* New Textures
* Redone Tank Models
* New Graphics
* Better Ballistics
* Offline Mode
* Improved Performance
* Updated Artillery Mode
* Improved Aviation AI
* New Reporting System
* Detailed Player Profiles
* 137 new camouflages
* Tank Balance Updates
* New Tutorials
* Turret And Body Move Independently

Full Relese Note:
https://goo.gl/ut8aEk
